comments.text:
It doesn't work if you open the html file with http: because of security restricions. You will see an error in the Firefox Error Console about that.
(Tools/Error Console) but it should work you you load the html file also with the file protocol.
This is works for me with a 1 week old Seamonkey trunk and also with my testinstallation of Firefox 2.0.0.1
